injuries.content: 20220905 Los Angeles Dodgers: LF Trevor Boone was injured on a defensive play. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220905 Cincinnati Reds: CF Garrett Whitley was injured on a defensive play. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220905 Minnesota Twins: 2B Eugenio Suarez was injured while running the bases. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220906 Minnesota Twins: Eugenio Suarez diagnosed with a sprained ankle, will miss 4-5 weeks. 20220906 Cincinnati Reds: CF Rodrigo Fern?ndez was injured . The Diagnosis: flu-like symptoms. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 3 days. 20220907 San Diego Padres: Jarrett Montgomery diagnosed with shoulder tendinitis, will miss one week. 20220907 Cincinnati Reds: Garrett Whitley diagnosed with shoulder tendinitis, will miss 5 weeks. 20220907 Texas Rangers: RF Chad W. Smith was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: mild calf strain. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 2 days. 20220907 Colorado Rockies: RP Kyle Funkhouser was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220908 Los Angeles Dodgers: Trevor Boone diagnosed with back tightness, will miss 2 weeks. 20220908 Chicago White Sox: SP Dakota Chalmers was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: sore thumb. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 2 days. 20220908 Seattle Mariners: 2B Cash Case was injured on a defensive play. The Diagnosis: high ankle sprain. He's expected to miss about 5 weeks. 20220908 Boston Red Sox: LF Malik Collymore was injured while throwing the ball. The Diagnosis: shoulder soreness. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 6 days. 20220908 Baltimore Orioles: 3B Kyler Murray was injured being hit by a pitch. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220908 Baltimore Orioles: CF Gene Bell was injured on a defensive play. The Diagnosis: strained oblique. He's expected to miss about 3-4 weeks. 20220909 Baltimore Orioles: Kyler Murray diagnosed with a fractured foot, will miss 3-4 weeks. 20220909 Cleveland Indians: LF Bryan Reynolds was injured on a defensive play. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220909 Milwaukee Brewers: SP Dylan Bundy was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: sore thumb. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 1 day. 20220909 Los Angeles Angels: C Tres Barrera was injured in a collision at a base. The Diagnosis: hyperextended elbow. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 2 weeks. 20220910 Colorado Rockies: Kyle Funkhouser diagnosed with a torn labrum, will miss 8 months. 20220910 Los Angeles Dodgers: C Wilson Garcia was injured while running the bases. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220911 St. Louis Cardinals: Jurickson Profar has suffered a setback in his recovery. He is not expected to recover for another 6 days. 20220911 Kansas City Royals: RF Mookie Betts was injured while throwing the ball. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220911 Arizona Diamondbacks: LF Dalton Ewing was injured being hit by a pitch. The Diagnosis: bruised foot. news.content: 20220905 Arizona Diamondbacks: Trey Dawson got suspended 3 games after ejection following a brawl. 20220905 San Francisco Giants: Cole Cardey got suspended 3 games after ejection following a brawl. 20220907 San Diego Padres: Ken'ichi Nakano pitches a 3-hit shutout against the Milwaukee Brewers with 9 strikeouts and 1 BB allowed! 20220907 Boston Red Sox: Kolby Allard pitches a 5-hit shutout against the Detroit Tigers with 7 strikeouts and 0 BB allowed! 20220909 Tampa Bay Rays: Patrick Raby pitches a 5-hit shutout against the Seattle Mariners with 4 strikeouts and 2 BB allowed! 20220910 San Diego Padres: Jacob Bennett pitches a 6-hit shutout against the Arizona Diamondbacks with 5 strikeouts and 1 BB allowed! 20220912 SS Jorge S?nchez of the Texas Rangers honored: Wins the MLB AL Player of the Week Award. 20220912 1B Blaise Salter of the Colorado Rockies honored: Wins the MLB NL Player of the Week Award.
